               Section 1 of Ord. No. 10-10-05, adopted Oct. 5, 2010, repealed the former ch. 70,
               arts. Iâ€”IV, Â§Â§ 70-1â€”70-13, 70-36â€”70-44, 70-66â€”70-68, 70-91â€”70-94, and enacted a new

Cross referenceâ€” 
               Any ordinance dedicating or accepting any subdivision plat saved from repeal, Â§ 1-10(10); buildings and building regulations, ch. 10; soil erosion and sedimentation control floods, Â§ 26-206 et seq.; floods, ch. 34; standards for subdivision proposals regarding floods, Â§ 34-69; manufactured homes and trailers, ch. 46; planning and development, ch. 58; zoning, ch. 78; subdivision regulations regarding watershed protection, Â§ 78-76 et seq.
               
State Law referenceâ€”
